_description: Gospel for Wednesday after the Twelfth Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint mathew tels to vnderstandWhils ihesu crist welk obout precheand…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …He helid all men more and lesOf all sere maners of sekenes
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Transiunte ihesu secuti sunt eum.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia iiii proxima secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 111va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.70-71.
